primarySegments.name: Urban Young Professionals
primarySegments.description: Tech-savvy young adults living in urban areas who value safety and quick access to emergency services.

problemsNeeds: Need quick access to emergency help
Desire for peace of mind while commuting or socializing
behaviors: Likely to share app with peers
Use app in public transport or nightlife scenarios

primarySegments.name: Elderly Living Independently
primarySegments.description: Older adults living alone who are concerned about personal safety and quick access to emergency assistance.

problemsNeeds: Need for a simple emergency alert system
Concern about falls or health emergencies
behaviors: Use app as a safety net
Rely on family or caregivers to set up app
Use app in home or familiar environments

primarySegments.name: Parents with Young Children
primarySegments.description: Parents who are concerned about the safety of their children and want a reliable way to alert family in emergencies.

problemsNeeds: Desire for quick communication in emergencies
Concern about accidents or health issues
behaviors: Teach children how to use app
